author: ate
msg: Combined fix for JS2-944 and JS2-945
See: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JS2-944 - PortletDefinition Language needs to indicate if its locale is a supported-locale as defined by or for the Portlet descriptor
and: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JS2-945 - Provide PortletApplication and PortletDefinition ResourceBundle lookup and caching from the PortletFactory
